scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && rimraf ./nyc_output && nyc -e .ts -x "**/*.spec.ts" -x "tst/*" --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.base.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc-esm-fix --target=lib/esm && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run _postbuild
